description: Enter a work period to show on your employees' pay stubs.
checkOnlyDescription: Select this option if all employees will be paid by check only. This allows you to set the check date to today or any future date.
startDateDescription: First day of the pay period
endDateDescription: Last day of the pay period

validations.endDateAfterStart: End date must be on or after start date
validations.startDateNotFuture: Start date cannot be in the future for correction payrolls
validations.checkDateAchLeadTime: Payment date must be at least 2 business days from today for direct deposit
